price: 28. Oo ogaada in maalkiinna iyo carruurtiinu ay yihiin fidmo (imtixaan) iyo in Alle agtiisa yahay Abaalgud weyn (Janno).
arabic: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-iʿ'lamū annamā amwālukum wa-awlādukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
